department.ch: 環境工程研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 本課程的目標是探索微生物在生物圈、生物技術和生物修復中的不同作用，並提供適用於管理自然和工程環境的綜合理解。
goal.en: “The goal of this course is to explore the diverse role of microbes in biogeochemical cycling, biotechnology, as well as bioremediation, and to provide an integrated understanding applicable to managing natural and engineered environments.“

outline.ch: “上的應用。授課主題包含了：1. 細胞結構與化學。2. 生物能量學。3. 微生物的代謝與生態。4. 微生物之分子生物與基因學。5. 元素的循環。6. 水及廢水處理。7. 生物復育工程。8. 致病菌與指標微生物。9. 生質燃料。網路演講:(1) Bacterial biofilms: far more than a collection ofgerms- Dianne Newman (Caltech).(2) Deciphering microbial community dynamics, fromgenomes to biomes- Ed DeLong (MIT)(3) Bioenergy production using microbial fuel celltechnologies- Bruce Logan (Penn State)(4) Bacterial communication via quorum sensing- BonnieBassler (Princeton)迷你實驗:(1) Anaerobic enrichments(2) Community analysis(3) Isolation(4) Purification永續環境技術 ( Sustainable Environmental Technolog…(5) Identification相關期刊論文的閱讀。“
outline.en: “Cell structure and chemistry2. Bioenergetics3. Metabolic diversity and microbial ecology4. Microbial molecular biology and genomics5. Biogeochemical cycles of elements6. Water and wastewater treatment7. Bioremediation8. Pathogens and indicator microorganisms9. BiofuelsFour webinar videos:(1) Bacterial biofilms: far more than a collection ofgerms- Dianne Newman (Caltech).(2) Deciphering microbial community dynamics, fromgenomes to biomes- Ed DeLong (MIT)(3) Bioenergy production using microbial fuel celltechnologies- Bruce Logan (Penn State)(4) Bacterial communication via quorum sensing- BonnieBassler (Princeton)Mini-lab section:(1) Anaerobic enrichments(2) Community analysis(3) Isolation(4) Purification(5) IdentificationVarious journal articles will be assigned“

Madigan, John M. Martinko, and Jack Parker.2. Environmental Microbiology: From Genomes toBiogeochemistry, Eugene L. Madsen.3. Environmental Biotechnology: Principles andApplications, Bruce E. Rittmann and Perry L. McCarty.“

flexDiscription.ch: 第17週期末考，第18週開放想了解總成績與期末考試卷內容有疑慮的同學至本人辦公室查詢。
flexDiscription.en: The final exam will be held on the 16th week; the 17th-week students can come to my office to check their final marks.

ch.competencies: 以人為本的社會價值與環境價值判斷與抉擇能力
符合系統思維的環境問題發現、分析及解決能力
合乎情理法的環境科學知識與工程技術運用能力
前瞻宏觀的需求分析、規劃決策及科技研發能力
積極有效的溝通表達、協調合作及整合領導能力
持續不斷的人文、科學及工程智能學習創新能力

en.competencies: The ability to justify principles of judgment and choice with considering the relation between social welfare and environmental sustainability
The ability to define and analyze environmental issues, to strategically plan and propose potential solutions
The ability to implement scientific knowledge and engineering techniques in the face of environmental problems
The ability to assess prospective needs at the macro level, to formulate decision-making, and to direct R & D.
The ability to lead positive and effective communication, coordination, cooperation and integration.
The ability to persistently innovate intelligent humanities, science and engineering.
